titleStmt.title: At a Councel of War held aboard, the 17 of October, 1654.
titleStmt.author: Lawson, John, Sir, d. 1665.

notesStmt.note: At head of text: Present Vice-Admiral John Lawson, Rear Admiral Dakins, Capt. Jonas Poole, Capt. Benjamin Blake, Capt. Iohn Lambert, Capt. Leon Harris, Capt. William Crispin, Capt. Rich. Lions, Capt. Edward Morcock, Capt. Iohn White, Capt. Richard Hodges, Capt. William Hannum, Capt. Clark, Capt. William Vessey, Capt. Henry Fen, Capt. Robert Story, Capt. Hawkes, Capt. Lightfoot, Capt. Hubart, Lieut. Haward, Lieut. Pride, Lieut. Trafford, Lieut. Hall, Lieut. Wilkinson, and Mr. Iohn Bear master of the Falmouth.
At end: This was signed by all the abovesaid Persons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
